metadata.name: The Sorceress Finds Harmony
metadata.description:
Animation from 3 stages with sound. The story of a novice Sorceress. It is shown that she achieves inner harmony and takes control of her powerful energy rushing out. 
~
Every person has an inner energy and a huge potential. Where to direct this infinite power of Being hidden in every particle of your body, in your soul? The answer will be prompted by the Truth within you, your inner Self, which connects you to the whole world through the Primary Source.
